title: Jumbled texts.
content: When I transcribe texts written on Windows 10 to answer e-mails through Thunderbird Firefox, they become so jumbled that they are unreadable. How may I transfer texts to e-mail correct?
creator: Jamesrsamec41

title: Grouped threads with new messages are not highlighted
content:
I am using Thunderbird 115.2.0 (64-bit) on Mac OS Ventura 13.5.1 (22G90).

I am using threaded conversations (View -> Sort by -> Threaded).

The problem I have is that threads with new messages are not highlighted. When I see that I have unread messages, I need to click too many times just to detect the threads with unread messages. Other clients simply highlights threads with unread messages.

Is there any way to have bold (highlighted) threaded messages when they contain unread emails?
creator: lordthistle

title: Não consigo enviar e-mail com cópia para mim mesma.
content:
Tenho mais de um e-mail. Apenas no que eu utilizo mais ('''mcglp--@--com''') não consigo enviar cópia para mim mesma.

mcglp--@--com e mcpe--@--com

Tento enviar ou responder via mcglp--@--com com cópia para mcglp--@--com

Recebo a mensagem abaixo e nem entendo o mcpe--@--com aparece no erro.

Falha ao enviar mensagem. Ocorreu um erro ao enviar email. O servidor de email respondeu: <mcglp--@--com>: Sender address rejected: not owned by user mcpe--@--com Verifique o destinatário da mensagem "mcglp--@--com" e tente novamente.
creator: mcglpedroso

title: How do I stop tdhis error message appearing and stopping me send an email?
content:
I frequently send out an email to two groups of people, BCCing all the recipients.

The email to the first group always goes smoothly. The identical email to the second group doesn't always.

Today, I sent the group one email and it went just fine. Then I tried to send a second and got this message: "Send Message Erro. "Sending of the message failed. "An error occurred while sending mail. The mail server responded: Error sending message for delivery. Please check the message and try again."

The message does have a.png attachment but it went just fine when I sent it to the other group. Any thoughts, anyone?
creator: rogercorke

title: Upgrade
content: Hi V.115 downloaded automatically and now cannot send emails. Unable to understand the new format
creator: matdom

title: Import Outlook Emails to Thunderbird manually
content:
Hi,

So I have a problem with importing emails from Outlook to Thunderbird. I started using Outlook in 2022, and in June 2023, I had a problem with my laptop and decided to reinstall Windows, and back up my .pst file. Later, in late August 2023, I decided to Install Thunderbird. I forgot to move my backup .pst in the Outlook files folder, so I only have my email from June 2023 on Outlook and later transferred to Thunderbird automatically. Now I successfully combine my old .pst with my newer .pst, but I can't import my email from Outlook, not even with import tools. When I tried to import, it always shows 0%, even after I wait for hours (1-2 hours). Can someone help me/give me a guide on how to import my .pst? For your information, if needed, my .pst size is 15GB. Thanks in advance.
creator: dzakyzamzam

title: TB 102.15.0 Infinite Loading
content:
TB 102.15.0 on Windows 7Pro:

TB was not responding, not showing any activity.

Closed all profiles, reopened profile which had had notice to upgrade from 102.14.0 and completed upgrade and restart.

Opened all profiles.

No apparent activity, "progress slider" to left of label in tab (here, "Inbox") continues to run "forever".

Closed all profiles, reopened one which has no Hotmail or Gmail accounts (to rule out problems there). Still shows infinite "progress".

I note that with the five profiles open, TB had 21 processes running!!! (Also had 32 processes for Firefox. After closing some FF windows, this went to 18 processes.)

What can I do to regain email?

TIA
creator: mdforme
